text:
I just downloaded the linux rh7.3 binary distribution and I cannot find
any of the mentioned in ol><li  number 3: "So a script named sign.sh is
distributed with the mod_ssl distribution (subdir pkg.contrib/). Use this script
for signing." 
Doing "find . | grep " on sign.sh or contrib doesn't get me anything - where
should I look for this probably very helpful file?
creator: hauser@acm.org
hauser@acm.org
text:
searching on, on my RedHat 8 installation, I found in /usr/share/ssl/cert a file

make-dummy-cert  (a shell script)
  and
Makefile

are those successors of sigh.sh ?

creator: colm@apache.org
